name: Spaced-Out
description:
Help our cube astronaut jump through space.
Avoid anything that moves.
Watch out for aliens on zip lines and spiralling cube meteorites.
Perfect timing will be needed to jump through the maze of aliens.
Jump into rockets and control the speed to avoid dangers.

Features.
-Casual tap style gameplay
-Avoid anything that moves
- Master your timing
-Easy one tap to play
-Hard to master.
-Endless random generated gameplay
-Leader board to challenge your friends.

How To Play
-Tap to jump
-When playing as a rocket, tap to slow down. or hold to stop for a few seconds.
